description.zh-cn: 世界上历史最悠久的大学之一，其授课历史可以追溯到12世纪中叶。1793年在法国大革命期间被解散，1896年重建，1970年被拆分为13所独立大学。
description.en: One of the oldest universities in the world, with a teaching history dating back to the mid-12th century. It was dissolved in 1793 during the French Revolution, re-established in 1896, and split into 13 independent universities in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西国王，于1200年官方认可巴黎大学。
description.en: King of France who officially recognized the University of Paris in 1200.

description.zh-cn: 罗马教宗，于1215年官方认可巴黎大学。
description.en: Pope of the Catholic Church who officially recognized the University of Paris in 1215.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎大学的第一个学院机构，由罗贝尔·德·索邦创立。
description.en: The first college of the University of Paris, founded by Robert de Sorbon.

description.zh-cn: 法国的社会政治激进革命时期，期间巴黎大学于1793年被解散。
description.en: A period of radical social and political upheaval in France, during which the University of Paris was dissolved in 1793.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西国王，其神父罗贝尔·德·索邦创立了索邦学院。
description.en: King of France whose chaplain, Robert de Sorbon, founded the Collège de Sorbonne.

description.zh-cn: 法国神学家，路易九世的神父，索邦学院的创始人。
description.en: French theologian, chaplain to King Louis IX, and founder of the Collège de Sorbonne.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一帝国皇帝，于1806年设立法兰西大学以掌管全法国教育。
description.en: Emperor of the French who established the University of France in 1806 to oversee all education in France.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑一世设立，掌管全法国教育的机构。
description.en: An institution established by Napoleon I to oversee all education in France.

description.zh-cn: 1968年在法国爆发的学生运动和社会危机，导致巴黎大学被拆分。
description.en: A period of civil unrest in France in 1968, consisting of student protests and general strikes, which led to the splitting of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的大学之一，是原巴黎大学文学院的主要继承者，于2018年与巴黎第六大学合并为索邦大学。
description.en: One of the universities established after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris, the main successor to its Faculty of Humanities. It merged with Paris VI University in 2018 to form Sorbonne University.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的大学之一，是原巴黎大学理学院的主要继承者，于2018年与巴黎第四大学合并为索邦大学。
description.en: One of the universities established after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris, the main successor to its Faculty of Science. It merged with Paris IV University in 2018 to form Sorbonne University.

description.zh-cn: 由巴黎第四大学和巴黎第六大学于2018年合并而成，继承了“索邦”的名号。
description.en: Formed in 2018 by the merger of Paris-Sorbonne University and Pierre and Marie Curie University, inheriting the 'Sorbonne' name.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的大学之一，于2019年与巴黎第七大学合并。
description.en: One of the universities established after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris, it merged with Paris Diderot University in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的大学之一，于2019年与巴黎第五大学合并。
description.en: One of the universities established after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris, it merged with Paris Descartes University in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 由巴黎第五大学和巴黎第七大学于2019年合并而成，后于2022年更名为巴黎西岱大学。
description.en: Formed in 2019 by the merger of Paris Descartes University and Paris Diderot University, later renamed Université Paris Cité in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 由“巴黎大学 (2019年成立)”于2022年更名而来。
description.en: The new name for the 'University of Paris (2019)' since 2022.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的大学之一，后合并进入巴黎文理大学。
description.en: One of the universities established after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris, it later merged into Paris Sciences et Lettres University.

description.zh-cn: 法国一所大学与院校共同体，巴黎第九大学已合并进入该校。
description.en: A collegiate university in France, which Paris Dauphine University has merged into.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的大学之一，后加入巴黎-萨克雷大学。
description.en: One of the universities established after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris, it later joined the University of Paris-Saclay.

description.zh-cn: 法国一所大学与院校共同体，巴黎第十一大学已加入。
description.en: A collegiate university in France, which Paris-Sud University has joined.

description.zh-cn: 罗马教宗，于1231年颁布法令授予巴黎大学多项特权。
description.en: Pope of the Catholic Church who issued a papal bull in 1231 granting the University of Paris several privileges.

description.zh-cn: 波兰裔法国物理学家、化学家，巴黎大学校友，1903年诺贝尔物理奖和1911年诺贝尔化学奖得主。
description.en: Polish and naturalized-French physicist and chemist, alumna of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1903 and the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1911.

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家，巴黎大学校友，1903年诺贝尔物理奖得主。
description.en: French physicist, alumnus of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1903.

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家，巴黎大学校友，1908年诺贝尔物理奖得主。
description.en: French physicist, alumnus of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1908.

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家，巴黎大学校友，1926年诺贝尔物理奖得主。
description.en: French physicist, alumnus of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1926.

zh-cn: 路易-维克多-皮埃尔-雷蒙·第七代德布罗意公爵

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家，巴黎大学校友，1929年诺贝尔物理奖得主。
description.en: French physicist, alumnus of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1929.

nodes.id: 弗雷德里克·约里奥-居里

zh-cn: 弗雷德里克·约里奥-居里

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家，巴黎大学校友，1935年诺贝尔化学奖得主。
description.en: French physicist, alumnus of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1935.

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家，巴黎大学校友，1935年诺贝尔化学奖得主。
description.en: French physicist, alumna of the University of Paris, winner of the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1935.

description.zh-cn: 法国后现代主义哲学家，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: French post-modernist philosopher, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 法国物理学家、数学家，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: French physicist and mathematician, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 法国存在主义作家，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: French existentialist writer, alumna of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 华人法律学家，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Chinese jurist, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 台湾文学家、艺术家、美学家，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese writer, artist, and esthetician, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 台湾民主化志士、三届立法委员，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Taiwanese democratization activist, three-term legislator, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法机关的成员。
description.en: Member of the legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国首位女法官，香港树仁大学前校长，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: China's first female judge, former president of Hong Kong Shue Yan University, alumna of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一所私立大学。
description.en: A private university in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 大律师，香港树仁大学校监，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Barrister, President of Hong Kong Shue Yan University, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 教育家，国立台湾师范大学前校长，原中华民国教育部部长，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Educator, former president of National Taiwan Normal University, former Minister of Education of the Republic of China, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管教育事务的最高机构。
description.en: The highest authority for educational affairs in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 教育家，华东师范大学前校长，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Educator, former president of East China Normal University, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 建筑师，创办中国文化大学建筑及都市设计学系，巴黎大学校友。
description.en: Architect, founder of the Department of Architecture and Urban Design at Chinese Culture University, alumnus of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所私立综合性大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 1970年原巴黎大学拆分后成立的13所大学之一。
description.en: One of the 13 universities created after the 1970 split of the original University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 法王腓力二世给予巴黎大学官方认可。
description.en: King Philip II granted official recognition to the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 教宗英诺森三世给予巴黎大学官方认可。
description.en: Pope Innocent III granted official recognition to the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 罗贝尔·德·索邦创立了索邦学院，作为巴黎大学的一部分。
description.en: Robert de Sorbon founded the Collège de Sorbonne as part of the University of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 罗贝尔·德·索邦是法国国王路易九世身旁的神父。
description.en: Robert de Sorbon was the chaplain to King Louis IX of France.

description.zh-cn: 索邦学院是巴黎大学的第一个学院机构，其名称“索邦”（Sorbonne）后来成为大学的代称。
description.en: The Collège de Sorbonne was the first college of the University of Paris, and its name 'Sorbonne' later became a metonym for the university.

description.zh-cn: 在法国大革命期间，巴黎大学于1793年被解散。
description.en: During the French Revolution, the University of Paris was dissolved in 1793.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑一世于1806年设立法兰西大学，以掌管全法国的教育。
description.en: Napoleon I established the University of France in 1806 to oversee all education in France.

description.zh-cn: 1968年的五月风暴学生运动导致巴黎大学于1970年被拆分为13所独立的大学。
description.en: The May 68 student protests led to the splitting of the University of Paris into 13 independent universities in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎第四大学与巴黎第六大学合并，成立了索邦大学。
description.en: Paris-Sorbonne University merged with Pierre and Marie Curie University to form Sorbonne University.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎第六大学与巴黎第四大学合并，成立了索邦大学。
description.en: Pierre and Marie Curie University merged with Paris-Sorbonne University to form Sorbonne University.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎第五大学与巴黎第七大学合并，成立了巴黎大学（2019年成立）。
description.en: Paris Descartes University merged with Paris Diderot University to form the University of Paris (established 2019).

description.zh-cn: 巴黎第七大学与巴黎第五大学合并，成立了巴黎大学（2019年成立）。
description.en: Paris Diderot University merged with Paris Descartes University to form the University of Paris (established 2019).

description.zh-cn: 巴黎大学（2019年成立）于2022年更名为巴黎西岱大学。
description.en: The University of Paris (established 2019) was renamed Université Paris Cité in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎第九大学已合并进入巴黎文理大学。
description.en: Paris Dauphine University has merged into Paris Sciences et Lettres University.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎第十一大学加入了大学与院校共同体巴黎-萨克雷大学。
description.en: Paris-Sud University joined the collegiate University of Paris-Saclay.

description.zh-cn: 教宗额我略九世于1231年颁布法令，授予巴黎大学包括司法自治权在内的多项特权。
description.en: Pope Gregory IX issued a papal bull in 1231, granting the University of Paris several privileges, including judicial autonomy.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·约里奥-居里

description.zh-cn: 卢修一曾担任三届立法委员。
description.en: Lu Hsiu-yi served three terms as a legislator.

description.zh-cn: 卢毓骏创办了中国文化大学建筑及都市设计学系。
description.en: Lu Yu-jun founded the Department of Architecture and Urban Design at Chinese Culture University.
